trans-unit.source: Indicates the personalization scope for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> object or the personalization scope that applies to a property on a Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 指出的個人化範圍<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>物件或 Web 組件控制項的屬性適用於個人化範圍。

trans-unit.source: Personalization scope is a key concept in Web Parts personalization and is tightly integrated with other settings, including the scope that the page, through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control, is running in; the scope associated with each property on a control; and the way in which the control was added to the page.
trans-unit.target: 個人化範圍是 Web 組件個人化的重要概念，而且與其他設定，包括範圍緊密整合的頁面，到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項，是在執行; 每一個屬性上的控制項，以及控制項已加入至頁面的方式與相關聯的範圍。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: For more information on personalization scope, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需個人化範圍的詳細資訊，請參閱[Web 組件個人化概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Personalization scope refers to how personalization data is applicable to different sets of users.
trans-unit.target: 個人化範圍指的是如何個人化資料適用於不同的使用者集合。

trans-unit.source: Some personalization data is applicable to only a specific user and control on a page.
trans-unit.target: 部分個人化資料也適用於只有特定使用者和在頁面上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Other personalization data is applicable to all users who view a site.
trans-unit.target: 其他個人化資料適用於所有使用者都可以檢視站台。

trans-unit.source: Personalization scope is used in various areas of personalization to indicate which set of data should be retrieved and displayed.
trans-unit.target: 個人化範圍用於個人化的不同區域中，以指出應該擷取和顯示的資料集。

trans-unit.source: When a page is running in Shared personalization scope, this indicates that only the personalization data for a specific control, applicable to all users viewing the control, should be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 當網頁共用個人化範圍中執行時，這表示，應該載入只有特定控制項，適用於檢視控制項的所有使用者的個人化資料。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the currently executing user's rights, this broadly applicable data can also be modified and saved back to the data store.
trans-unit.target: 根據目前正在執行的使用者權限，這項廣泛適用於資料可以也修改並儲存到資料存放區。

trans-unit.source: When a page is running in User personalization scope, this indicates that a control's personalization data should be saved and loaded based on the currently executing user.
trans-unit.target: 當網頁正在執行使用者個人化範圍中時，這表示控制項的個人化應該儲存和載入資料會根據目前正在執行的使用者。

trans-unit.source: Usually, this means user-specific data can be loaded and saved on a control, while broadly applicable data (or shared data) can only be viewed on the control.
trans-unit.target: 通常，這表示可以載入及針對適用的資料 （或共用的資料），才可檢視在控制項上時，控制，儲存使用者專屬資料。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control, which manages the high-level life cycle of personalization, executes in one of the two personalization scopes.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項，負責管理高層級的生命週期的個人化，在兩個個人化範圍的其中一個會執行。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: When referring to the scope on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Shared" name="Shared" href=""></xref> scope means that personalization data applies to all users for all personalizable controls on a page and is also available to be saved on the page.
trans-unit.target: 當參照的範圍上<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>控制項， <xref uid="langword_csharp_Shared" name="Shared" href=""> </xref>範圍表示個人化資料套用到所有使用者 頁面上的所有可個人化控制項，而且也會儲存在頁面上提供。

trans-unit.source: When referring to the scope associated with a Web Parts control property, `Shared` scope indicates that the property normally only allows loading or saving of data associated with all users.
trans-unit.target: 當參照 Web 組件的控制項屬性相關聯的範圍`Shared`範圍指示屬性通常只允許載入或儲存的所有使用者相關都聯的資料。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: When referring to the scope on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>control, <xref uid="langword_csharp_User" name="User" href=""></xref> scope means that personalization data that is user-specific, as well as personalization data that applies to all users, is loaded for all personalizable controls on a page.
trans-unit.target: 當參照的範圍上<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>控制項， <xref uid="langword_csharp_User" name="User" href=""> </xref>範圍表示是特定使用者的個人化資料，以及適用於所有的使用者個人化資料載入的頁面上的所有可個人化控制項。

trans-unit.source: Only personalization data that is user-specific can be saved on the page.
trans-unit.target: 特定使用者的個人化資料可以儲存在頁面上。

trans-unit.source: When referring to the scope associated with a Web Parts control property, `User` scope indicates that the property can only load and store data applicable to all users when running on a page in `Shared` scope.
trans-unit.target: 當參照 Web 組件的控制項屬性相關聯的範圍`User`範圍表示屬性只能載入及儲存資料適用於所有使用者，在頁面上執行時`Shared`範圍。

trans-unit.source: However, when the property's control is running on a page in `User` scope, the property's per-user and all-user data will be loaded and merged.
trans-unit.target: 不過，當屬性的控制項上執行中的頁面`User`範圍、 屬性的每個使用者和所有使用者資料會載入並合併。

trans-unit.source: In this case, though, only per-user data will be saved when a page is running in `User` scope.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，不過，只有個別使用者資料時將會儲存的頁面執行`User`範圍。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
